Bali Dynasty Resort One of South Kuta's premier resorts, the Bali Dynasty Resort is an unbeatable choice for families with its kids waterpark, fun atmosphere and proximity to South Kuta Beach. The resort has a beach club and three pools including the main pool with swim-up bar, a relaxing adult only lazy pool with individual plunge pools and submerged sun lounges, a large dedicated kids pool with a 56 metre waterslide and kids water fun zone, a baby pool plus kids and teens clubs. The resort boasts a range of rooms and suites to suit all needs, including Family Suites with separate bedroom with ensuite bathroom. There are six restaurants and five bars to suit all budgets including the popular Gracie Kelly's Irish Pub and the spa offers a complete range of massages and beauty treatments. Family Studio Room (7 Nights) Travel Dates: 21 Jul - 17 Sep 26 & 12 Oct - 31 Oct 26 Family per person 2 adults and 2 children (aged 2-11 years) fr $768 Family of 5 (2A/3C) per person fr $622 Travel Dates: 21 Apr - 30 Jun 26 Family per person 2 adults and 2 children (aged 2-11 years) fr $726 Family of 5 (2A/3C) per person fr $587 Travel Dates: 30 Nov - 8 Dec 25, 12 Dec - 18 Dec 25, 19 Jan - 8 Mar 26 & 21 Mar - 31 Mar 26 Family per person 2 adults and 2 children (aged 2-11 years) fr $719 Family of 5 (2A/3C) per person fr $580 Note: ^Savings amount is already included in the advertised price and no further discount applies. Please enquire for travel for any other dates Includes 7 nights at Bali Dynasty - Full breakfast daily. - Wifi. - Kids 6 years and under eat free when dining with the same number of full paying adults, while kids 7-12 years pay 50% at H2O Restaurant Theme Buffet Dinners. - Entrance to Kids Club (4-16 years old) - Entrance to Gym. - Use of Bicycles. - Happy Hours 2x per day, from 12 pm-1pm and 5pm-6pm where you can enjoy a 50% discount off house cocktails, local spirits and soft drinks and 25% off house wine and local Beer. - Activities for all ages including the highest splash contest, watermelon eating competition, Limbo, towel origami, poolside golf, Balinese offering workshop, face painting, duck feeding, art workshops, Indonesian language classes, cooking demonstrations, water volleyball, treasure hunts, bingo and much more(subject to change without prior notice) Return private transfers from Denpasar airport to hotel Bonus ^ SAVE up to 15% - Free 1 x Theme Night Buffet Dinner at H2O Restaurant (per guest / per stay) - 1 x 20% Discount on A La Carte at Cafe Piazza - 1 x 20% Discount Food only A La Carte at Golden lotus Chinese Restaurant - 1 x 20% Discount food only at Gracie Kelly Irish Pub - 1 x 20% Discount food only at Queens of India - 1 x Buy 1 cocktail and get the second one for free at D'Lounge - 1 x Buy 1 Get 1 Free Love bucket Cocktail at Oasis restaurant - 1 x Purchase 3 massage treatments and get 4th free at Ashoka Spa - 2 x 15 minutes massage at Ashoka Spa - 1 x 25% Discount on Spa Package at Ashoka Spa - 1 x 15% Discount at Flair Hair Salon - L'Oreal Hair Treatment package - 1 x 10% Discount for one time laundry delivery - 1 x Free 10 pieces of Laundry for one time delivery - 1 x 1 Hour Padel Court Rental - 1 x 15% off at Drix's Barber Shop - Full Monty Per Person, from $580 Enquire More Deals Enquire *Terms and Conditions It is our policy to present the cost of our holidays inclusive of all airport and government charges. Please accept however that these charges are not within our control, therefore we reserve the right to pass on any increase . Travel agent professional service fees where charged, will be additional to the advertised prices . Closeout and blackout periods apply over school holidays and peak holiday periods & availability of seats & rooms is likely to be very limited over this time . Valid for sales to 30 Nov 2025. Valid for travel commenced and completed within the period 1 Oct 2025 to 31 Oct 2026 (unless otherwise specified).Family pricing is based on a per person cost for up to 2 adults and 3 children (2-11) sharing one room and using existing bedding. Extra night rates are per person. Prices shown are based on per person costs in New Zealand Dollars, for payment by cash, cheque or eftpos only. Credit card sales not permitted unless Travel Agent acts as a merchant. Capacity limitations apply and may not be available on all services. Travel requiring an overnight stay in New Zealand will be at passengers own expense. Events beyond our control such as currency fluctuations and changes to the price of aviation fuel may result in prices variations . Strict cancellation fees apply. Packages are based on consecutive nights. For split stays please contact your travel consultant. For full terms and conditions and cancellation fees please contact your local travel agent for more information. Trade enquiries via GO Holidays. Issue Date: 01 Oct 25.
